sentences.english: Thinking structure in childhood in the development of the critical period.
sentences.chinese: 思维结构在儿童期处于发生发展的关键期。

sentences.english: Safety measures co-evolve with the development of the technology.
sentences.chinese: 安全措施与技术的发展共同演化。

sentences.english: In this way,we can develop ourselves in different aspects.
sentences.chinese: 这样我们就可以在不同的方面发展自己。

sentences.english: Changshan archipelago is rich in resources, and the development of coastal economy is very fast.
sentences.chinese: 长山群岛资源丰富，海岛经济发展较快。

sentences.english: Gradually,it became a stage show on its own in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十八世纪，芭蕾渐渐地发展成为了一种舞台表演。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has demanded that U.S.-led NATO bear all responsibilities for this incident, and the Chinese side will continue to pay close attention to the development of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 中方将继续密切关注情况的发展。

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移动电话已经使发展中国家跨越了固话网络这个阶段。

sentences.english: In which of the three areas of membership development do clubs in the district need improvement?
sentences.chinese: 地区内的扶轮社在社员发展的三方面需要改善？

sentences.english: The development of financial circles and strick precaution of the risk are closely linked with disclosure of financial information.
sentences.chinese: 金融业的发展及其风险的防范与信息披露息息相关。

sentences.english: The Qing Dynasty is the Anhui local chronicle development prosperous time.
sentences.chinese: 清代是安徽方志发展的鼎盛时期。

sentences.english: Chapter Two, development process of publicizing general village affairs.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，村务公开的发展历程。

sentences.english: Finally, we give the prospect of VDSL.
sentences.chinese: 最后，展望了VDSL的发展前景。

sentences.english: Lastly certain countermeasures to the development of higher education service industry in Jilin Province are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对吉林省发展高教服务产业提出了对策建议。

sentences.english: Technology makes distance-education have more development space.
sentences.chinese: 技术使远程教育有了更大的发展空间。

sentences.english: The insurance industry is one of the fastest developing industries in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 保险行业是全球经济中发展最快的行业之一。

sentences.english: Alleviating air traffic congestion is one of the major goals of the new push into high-speed rail.
sentences.chinese: 推动高铁发展的主要目的，就是缓解空中交通的拥挤。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
Xinxing county in Yunfu 雲浮|云浮[Yun2 fu2], Guangdong/Xinxing or Hsinhsing district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
(of markets, industries, infectious diseases etc) rising/emerging/in the ascendant
to rise abruptly (to a towering position)/to tower over/to spring up/to emerge suddenly/the emergence (e.g. of a power)
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
